data_protection.paragraph_1: We, Share&Charge, a service of MotionWerk GmbH, Opernplatz 1, 45129 Essen, Tel.: +49(0)201-8133108, E-Mail: info@shareandcharge.com („MotionWerk“) we protect your interest in our platform „Share&Charge“ and we know the date protection is important for you.
data_protection.paragraph_3: Anonymized session IDs declare the provision of our services. By using our services, you agree that we will assign you a session ID per session.
data_protection.paragraph_4: I do not want to benefit from Session ID & contradict my session ID assignment.

about.title: Info
about.headline: What is Share&Charge?
about.paragraph_1: Share&Charge makes electric car charging accessible to everyone. Sign up to become part of our community.

form.plugtypes_copy: Check every plug type is supported by your e-car.

error_msgs.plateNumber: Please enter your license plate number.
error_msgs.maxCharging: Please select the max. charging power.

my_cars.delete_confirm_message: Are your sure you want to delete this car?

intro.first_slide: As an early e-mobilist you knew it already. Someone needs to be the first. And today it is you. We are looking forward to see our community growing, with you.
intro.second_slide: Use our interactive map to find charging stations within your area. With the help of the filters you can filter specifically according to your search criteria.
intro.third_slide: You own a charging station? Register it and decide who can charge at it, when and to which tariff.
intro.fourth_slide: Your wallet gives you an overview of your transactions. Charge your wallet easily and payout your money or use it to charge your e-car.

charging.add_car_first: Please add an e-car before you start the charging process
charging.agb_3: of the charging station operator apply.
charging.stop_confirmation: Are you sure that you want to stop the charging process?

location_details.error_no_station_details: There are not enough details provided about this charging station.
location_details.message: If you see a price range in place of an exact price, it is because you have not yet added an e-car. Add an e-car to calculate by battery capacity.

map.title: Map
map.error_no_location: We're sorry, but we could not determine your location. Please check your GPS signal.

login.email_remind: Please enter your e-mail address again.
login.message_sent_mail: We sent you an e-mail to reset your password!
login.password_complexity: Please select a secure password with at least 10 characters and no three consecutive characters.
login.agb_agree: You need to agree to our terms and conditions.

data.input_new_password: Please enter your new password. Min. 10 characters.
data.resend_email_confirmation: The confirmation e-mail was sent to you again. Please check your inbox and/or spam folder.
data.confirm_delete_message: Do you really want to delete your profile? This is permanent?

station.msg_complete_profile: If you want to register a charging station, please complete your profile.
station.msg_confirm_delete: Do you really want to delete this photo?
station.msg_confirm_delete_station: Do you really want to delete this charging station?
station.msg_none: Select this option if you do not have any of the charging stations listed below. In this case, the settlement of the charging process is based on trust.
station.msg_sc_light_module: Select this option if your charging station has Wi-Fi, GSM, and a light client which can control the charging station via the Share&Charge app.
station.msg_kwh_type: This option will be released soon. It presupposes a calibrated electricity meter in your charging station.
station.no_mail_found_msg: Please select a contact with at least one e-mail adress.
station.mail_not_registered_msg: The selected e-mail address is not registered with Share&Charge
station.registered_mail_not_found_msg: None of the selected e-mail addresses is registered with Share&Charge.
station.msg_confirm_delete_addr: Do you really want to delete this e-mail address from the tariff?
station.terms_and_conditions: Do you want to use your own terms and conditions? Please contact us at (registrierung@shareandcharge.com)
station.kwh_notice: The kWh are calculated by multiplying the charging capacity of the e-car and the charging time.
station.flatrate_message: Flatrate for a max. duration of four hours.
station.hourly_message: Please add your energy costs, which you are paying to your energy provider.
station.parking_message: Please add the costs, which the charger pays for the duration that he uses your parking lot.
station.choose_tarif_notice: You need to select at least one tariff.
station.msg_juice_box: Select this option if you have a JuiceBoxÂ® EV Charging Station that is connected to the JuiceNet.
station.juice_box_info_text: Please provide the Device Id and a Guest pairing PIN so that Share&Charge is able to connect to your JuiceBox. You can find the information by logging into the eMotorWerks Portal. Then go "My JuiceNet >> My JuiceNet Devices" and click on "Guest pairing pin" for the device you want to connect.

wallet.msg_voucher_credited: The vouchers have been credited to your wallet!
wallet.msg_complete_profile: In order to make payments, please complete your profile first.

error_messages.address: Please enter your address and house number.
error_messages.operatorVat: To ensure that your bill is correct, please let us know if you have a VAT number and entitled to deduct pre-tax. Otherwise, we will not indicate VAT on your invoice according to the Value Added Tax Act.
error_messages.device_id: Please provide a valid Device Id.
error_messages.guest_pin: Please provide a valid Guest pairing pin.
error_messages.invalid_country: This country is currently not supported.

pay_out.type_password_safety: For safety reasons, please enter your password for payout
